data.title: Announcer Spotlight #3 - Gus Johnson
data.meta_description: The 2021-22 College Football Season enters Week 3 with many big games on the docket. Gus Johnson of Fox Sports will be on the call when Nebraska visits Oklahoma.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

The 2021-22 College Football Season enters Week 3 with many big games on the docket. Gus Johnson of Fox Sports will be on the call when Nebraska visits Oklahoma. The game will be live at 12pm on Fox. The Cornhuskers and Sooners used to play each season until Nebraska left the Big 12 Conference to join the Big Ten Conference in 2012. Interestingly enough Oklahoma just recently agreed to join the SEC Conference starting in 2025. Gus Johnson is one of the best College Football Announcers and lets the viewer feel as if he/she is right there at the game. He always comes impeccably prepared with knowledge of both teams playing and the history of the rivalry if applicable. Oklahoma should defeat Nebraska this Saturday 9/18 but it may be a closer game than most fans think it will be. Gus Johnson will be on the call with Joel Klatt along with sideline reporter Jenny Taft. The trio are coming off a fantastic performance last Saturday 9/11 as they saw Oregon upset Ohio State in Columbus. I am looking forward to this great game and hearing the always enthusiastic voice of Gus Johnson with the play-by-play.
